content:
we set up the 3 branches of our government, and they are all more or less functioning
all the debt is assumed and being paid
we passed taxes; money is coming into the treasury
the authority of the constitution has been challenged and asserted
	(ex via the whiskey rebellion)
we have signed and negotiated treaties with major european powers
we are moving onto our own feet on the international stage
we know his greatest gesture was stepping away from power
